content.description: The figure shows two nuclear reactions. In Reaction <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math>, a <math alttext="Uranium 238" overflow="scroll"> <mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi> <mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">‐</mo> <mn>238</mn> </math> nucleus reacts with Particle <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mi>X</mi></math> to produce a <math alttext="Uranium 239" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">‐</mo><mn>239</mn></math> nucleus. In Reaction <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, the <math alttext="Uranium 239" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">U</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">‐</mo><mn>239</mn></math> nucleus decays into a <math alttext="Neptunium 239" overflow="scroll"><mi>Np</mi><mo lspace="0em" rspace="0em">‐</mo><mn>239</mn></math> nucleus, Particle <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"> <mi>Y</mi> </math>, and an antineutrino.
content.question:
Which of the following correctly identifies particles <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"> <mi>X</mi> </math> and <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mi>Y</mi></math>?

Particle <math alttext="X" overflow="scroll"><mi>X</mi></math>
 Particle <math alttext="Y" overflow="scroll"><mi>Y</mi></math>

A
 <math alttext="neutron" overflow="scroll"><mmultiscripts><mtext>n</mtext><mprescripts></mprescripts><mn>0</mn><mn>1</mn></mmultiscripts></math>
 <math alttext="alpha" overflow="scroll"><mi>α</mi></math>

B
 <math alttext="neutron" overflow="scroll"><mmultiscripts><mtext>n</mtext><mprescripts></mprescripts><mn>0</mn><mn>1</mn></mmultiscripts></math>
 <math alttext="beta minus" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>β</mi><mo>−</mo></msup></math>

C
 <math alttext="gamma" overflow="scroll"><mi>γ</mi></math>
 <math alttext="alpha" overflow="scroll"><mi>α</mi></math>

D
 <math alttext="gamma" overflow="scroll"><mi>γ</mi></math>
 <math alttext="beta minus" overflow="scroll"><msup><mi>β</mi><mo>−</mo></msup></math>

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
